com.mygdx.gameobjects.minerobjects

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.gameobjects.minerobjects.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which represent an inventory, used by the miner Mostly coded by : http://pixelscientists.com/wordpress/?p=15
